FILE: cm225255v11.0.txt
DYAD: SWITZERLAND - GERMANY/PRUSSIA
RIVALRY: RIV601
DISPUTE(S): MID149 
RIVALRY: RIV602
DISPUTE(S): MID3342 
RIVALRY: RIV10603 ISOLATED
DISPUTE(S): MID1686 MID1783 MID1788 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180213
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180213

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

Pre-1900 MIDs: MID149

WWII MIDs: MID1686 MID1783 MID1788

MID3342 

TERRMID: MID3342 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3342 3 -- uncertain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID3342 from Gibler, Miller, and Little (2016), Switzlerland mobilized the civilian guard near the start of WWI. GML recommend this case be dropped because the mobilization was not directed at any country, so coded uncertain. 

TERRLINK: MID3342 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3342 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID3342 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3342 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3342 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3342 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3342 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3342 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3342 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3342 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3342 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3342 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3342 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3342 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 
RIV10603 is coded isolated since all the disputes are related to World War~II.

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D. M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
